== Main Inclusion Report for Qalculate ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/q/qalculate-gtk/, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** has a cleaner and easier UI than gcalctool
** nevertheless more powerful
** might be a good replacement for gcalctool
** see: http://archives.free.net.ph/message/20060213.114812.54bb1f91.en.html
 0. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review:
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** No showstopper Debian bugs.
** Good maintenance in Debian.
** Active upstream.
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[http://|upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Meets <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards.
** Standard debhelper/cdbs/dbs packaging, standard patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** most not yet in main
